directions.step:
Date: Thu, 12 Aug 93 09:33:35 +0200
From: hz225wu@unidui.uni-duisburg.de (Micaela Pantke) (COLLECTION)
From: ruby@crash.amigans.gen.nz (Vida Halligan)
Source: _Aunt Daisy's NEW COOKERY_ (1947) Sift flour and salt, add sugar; Rub in the butter. Mix milk and soda add flavouring; mix this into dry ingredients, Knead, roll out about 1/4 inch thick, cut into shapes, cook in a quick oven 350-400 deg F
REC.FOOD.RECIPES ARCHIVES
/COOKIES
From rec.food.cooking archives. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
